abstract: Britain’s former prime minister, Tony Blair, will join the banking giant JPMorgan Chase & Company as a part-time adviser, a person with knowledge of the decision said Wednesday night.
snippet: Britain’s former prime minister, Tony Blair, will join the banking giant JPMorgan Chase & Company as a part-time adviser, a person with knowledge of the decision said Wednesday night.
lead_paragraph: The former prime minister of Britain, Tony Blair, will join the banking giant JPMorgan Chase & Company as a part-time adviser, a person with knowledge of the decision said Wednesday night.

headline.main: Tony Blair Expected to Join JPMorgan
headline.print_headline: Tony Blair Expected To Join JPMorgan

abstract: The former prime minister of Britain, Tony Blair, will join the banking giant JPMorgan Chase as a part-time adviser, the bank said.
lead_paragraph: The former prime minister of Britain, Tony Blair, will join the banking giant JPMorgan Chase as a part-time adviser, the bank said.

headline.main: Tony Blair to Join JPMorgan as Adviser
